mapper.select: SELECT count(*) From dynamic Where dynamicUserID in (SELECT agreeID from relation WHERE type=1 AND applyID = #{0} UNION SELECT applyID from relation WHERE type=1 AND agreeID = #{0} ) ORDER by dynamicTime DESC
SELECT count(*) From dynamic Where dynamicUserID = #{0} ORDER by dynamicTime DESC
mapper.insert: insert into dynamic (dynamicUserID, content, dynamicTime, likeNumber, commentNumber,photo) values(#{dynamicUserID}, #{content}, #{dynamicTime}, 0, 0 ,#{photo})
mapper.update: update dynamic set likeNumber=#{likeNumber} where dynamicID = #{0}
update dynamic set commentNumber=#{commentNumber} where dynamicID = #{0}
